Missing Marokopa man Tom Phillips: Police reward offer for information set to expire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-marokopa-man-tom-phillips-police-reward-offer-for-information-ends-in-one-week/FBN6KLVTYBCCTPXWUAMB3H7LOQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-marokopa-man-tom-phillips-police-reward-offer-for-information-ends-in-one-week/FBN6KLVTYBCCTPXWUAMB3H7LOQ/ Raphael FranksSearch for the dad and his three kids, missing for 30 months, has ramped up recently. Thu, 20 Jun 2024 06:38:44 +0000 Tom Phillips and his three children Jayda, Maverick and Ember were reported missing from Marokopa by family on 18 January 2022. Yesterday evening (02 August 2023) Police received reports of sightings of Tom in a brown/bronze 2003 Toyota Hilux flat-deck ute (pictured) on State Highway 31 in the Kawhia area. The children were not with him. We are urging anyone who may have any information, no matter how small, to please come forward to Police. If it is happening now, call 111 and quote file number 211218/5611. Picture supplied by Police
